name: MLActionClassifier.DataSource
desc: A data source for an action classifier.

items.name: case labeledDirectories(at: URL)
items.desc: The location of a folder with subfolders each of which contain sample videos of an action.

items.name: case labeledFiles(at: URL)
items.desc: The location of a folder that contains video files whose names you use to label corresponding actions.

items.name: case directoryWithVideosAndAnnotation(at: URL, annotationFile: URL, videoColumn: String, labelColumn: String, startTimeColumn: String?, endTimeColumn: String?)
items.desc: The location of a directory of video files, and the location of an action annotation file.

items.name: case labeledVideoData(table: MLDataTable, videoColumn: String, labelColumn: String, startTimeColumn: String?, endTimeColumn: String?)
items.desc: A data table that contains the locations of the video files and the action annotations.

items.name: case labeledKeypointsData(table: MLDataTable, sessionIdColumn: String, labelColumn: String, featureColumn: String)
items.desc: A data table that contains the human body landmark movement data.

items.name: func videosWithAnnotations() -> MLDataTable
items.desc: Generates a data table of the data sourceâ€™s video URL locations and action annotations.

items.name: func keypointsWithAnnotations(targetFrameRate: Double) -> MLDataTable
items.desc: Generates a data table with action annotations of the data source.

items.name: func stratifiedSplit(proportions: [Double], seed: Int, labelColumn: String) -> MLDataTable
items.desc: Generates a data table by splitting the data source into strata.

items.name: case labeledKeypointsDataFrame(DataFrame, sessionIdColumn: String, labelColumn: String, featureColumn: String)
case labeledVideoDataFrame(DataFrame, videoColumn: String, labelColumn: String, startTimeColumn: String?, endTimeColumn: String?)
